isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING PROTECTION AND DIAGNOSTIC SYSTEM (APAds™) DESCRIPTION, OPERATION, TROUBLESHOOTING, REMOVE, INSTALL, AND ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT DIAGRAMS MAINTENANCE MANUAL - INSTALL - LOW SIDE PORT ADAPTER

svcproc.title: LOW SIDE PORT ADAPTER
svcproc.para: The low side port adapter install procedures are in the following steps.

step1.para: Evacuate the system for at least thirty minutes.
Install low side port adapter between compressor and suction side hose.

note.para: Make sure all O-rings are properly lubricated with correct refrigerant oil.
Check routing of the suction side hose and ensure that there is no rubbing of chafing.

step1.para: Install the suction side hose coming off the compressor, connect low side hose to the low side port adapter on the compressor.
Using a service machine, install the refrigerant into the A/C system in accordance with the GROUP 16-AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
